# annotations

**Interface Property**

An array holding all the annotations on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
annotations?: Annotation[];
```

## Discussion

The default value is `[]` (empty array).

## Configuring map annotations

- **annotationForCluster**: Modifies cluster annotations.
- **selectedAnnotation**: The selected annotation on the map.

items.description: The selected annotation on the map.
